game.name: Distant Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Distant Space are present the arcade game of cosmic fights in arcade style of the 80's, this is a game where you can control the spaceship and forced to destroy extraterrestrials, which are moving in the certain order.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Distant Space are present the arcade game of cosmic fights in arcade style of the 80's, this is a game where you can control the spaceship and forced to destroy extraterrestrials, which are moving in the certain order.

reviewHighlights.text: 겜 자체도 쉽고 업적깨기 좋음. 재미도 나름있긴함. 근데 무료니까 했지. 돈주고 할건아님.
